title: The Truth About Stacey
description: Poor Stacey. She's moved to a new town. She's still coming to terms with her diabetes. She's facing baby-sitting problems left and right. And her parents are no help.Luckily, Stacey has three new, true friends: Kristy, Claudia, and Mary Anne. Together, they're the BSC, and they will deal with whatever's thrown their way - even if it's a rival baby-sitting club!
author: Ann M. Martin
